title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the DistributedLogAnalyzer system, including components, data flow, communication protocols, scalability considerations, security measures, and fault tolerance mechanisms.

title: Gather Requirements
description: Collect and document requirements for the DistributedLogAnalyzer system, including input log formats, analysis rules, and output formats.

title: Design Log Collection
description: Design the log collection component, including log shipping mechanisms, load balancing, fault tolerance, and data security.

title: Design Log Processing - Modular and Scalable Approach
description: Design a modular, scalable log processing component that includes log parsing, normalization, analysis rule engines, and data pipelines. Ensure error handling for edge cases, performance optimizations, and compatibility with various distributed system logs.

title: Design Data Storage
description: Design the data storage component, including database schemas, indexing, data retention policies, and data partitioning strategies for scalability and performance.
